https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/sort-object?view=powershell-6

For the -Descending option there is this remark: "_To sort by some properties in ascending order and others in descending order, you must specify their property values by using a hash table._" An example of how to do that would be very helpful.
